other_tests.findings: Large rounded focus of inflammatory change with mesenteric fat stranding in the right lower quadrant anterior to the cecum measuring approximately 2.8 x 2.1 cm. Tract of contrast extending from the anterior cecal wall with high-density material. Focal, segmental and asymmetric cecal wall thickening in the ventral wall. Normal appendix size, but tip appears to terminate within the inflammatory change. Tiny lymph nodes in the ileocolic region, largest measuring 4 mm. Small 4-mm stone within the bladder.
